oai_dc:dc.dc:title: THE ORGANIC PRODUCTION IN BOLIVIA: The way to an ecological Nation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vildozo, Luis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bolivia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: THE ORGANIC PRODUCTION IN BOLIVIA: The way to an ecological Nation. The new government of president of Bolivia Evo Morales presents a perspective of great change in many aspects of the lives of Bolivians. The agricultural sector is included in this shift of thinking and constitutes a pivotal axis in the policy of the new government.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Vildozo, Luis (2007) THE ORGANIC PRODUCTION IN BOLIVIA: The way to an ecological Nation. Institute for Organic Farming, AT-Vienna, Department for Sustainable Agriculture Systems. [Unpublished]
